AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child of another race
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born of a different race than [PAWN_possessive] parents possessed. Nevertheless, [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in a loving family that raised [PAWN_objective] to be a kind and free from prejudice.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: oppressed child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was a victim of racism. Other ponies constantly bullied [PAWN_objective], which is why [PAWN_pronoun] often had to participate in many fights and quarrels. As a result of prolonged harassment, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up to be a suspicious and withdrawn foal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: friend of unicorns
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was surrounded only by unicorn friends. They shared with [PAWN_objective] various interesting facts about magic, expanding [PAWN_possessive] knowledge in this field.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wizard's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] parents early and was a homeless orphan for a long time. Then [PAWN_pronoun] was found and sheltered by an old wandering hermit wizard. The wizard raised [PAWN_objective] throughout [PAWN_possessive] childhood and taught [PAWN_objective] the art of magic.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: struck by a basilisk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] fell under the petrifying gaze of a basilisk, but another pony was able to save [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] underwent long-term rehabilitation, but some health problems and pathological fear of wild animals still plague [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child of Light
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family worshipping the Goddess of Light. Since [PAWN_pronoun] lived among sectarians, [PAWN_nameDef] received mainly religious views about the structure of the world around [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child of Darkness
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family worshipping the Goddess of Darkness. Since [PAWN_pronoun] lived among sectarians, [PAWN_nameDef] received mainly religious views about the structure of the world around [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: born of Magic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a result of a very complex and expensive ritual using pure magical essence, taken half from each parent. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood away from society for safety reasons.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Friendship school student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a student of one of the most popular and ancient schools of Old Equestria, which was extremely prestigious at that time. [PAWN_pronoun] gained deep insights into the field of social and moral relations, which naturally suggesting the superiority of friendship magic.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Magic school student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] showed an interest in a variety of magical sciences. Parents decided to send [PAWN_objective] to study at the School of Magic, [PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot of new things while receiving specialized education and studying various scientific disciplines.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: under care of an alicorn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under tragic circumstances when famine struck in [PAWN_possessive] country. [PAWN_pronoun] was lucky enough to be under the care of an alicorn who arrived on a charity mission. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up to be a diligent foal and from an early age [PAWN_pronoun] began to study the lessons of friendship and science.
